metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3479 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability found in nss. By this security vulnerability, nss client auth crash without a user certificate in the database and this can lead us to a segmentation fault or crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.82-1ubuntu0.1
libnss3-tools - 2:3.82-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.82-1ubuntu0.1').
